short_points: Used Bike selling website. Sellers can sell products or buyers can buy used Bike from here.
Also I create an admin panel. Here admin can remove any product and any buyer and seller
long_points: we have a dashboard system and you can see your activitys.
We have a admin route and admin can delete or verify users.
on time Payment System for bye any product
technology: React.js, MongoDB, Firebase, Node js, Express js, Tailwind CSS.

short_points: A simple service related website where users can show how many services are provided by the author.
Users can review on any services and other users can also show those reviews.
long_points: more secure website your data won't be hacked from our website Our data come from DataBase so don't worry about your privacy
You can Create new services for me => You Can also delete your review
I have user node and express for create server
I use CRUD operation in this website
technology: React.js, MongoDB, Node js Express js, Firebase, Bootstrap.
